name: ValidateTagPipelineQuery
description:
Validate the syntax and structure of a tag pipeline query.

Use this tool to ensure that a tag pipeline query is correctly structured and free of syntax errors.

parameters.description: The tag pipeline query to validate. Ensure it is correctly structured and free of syntax errors.

parameters.name: query_resource_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of resource for query validation, always use 'validate_query'.
